data.name: The Viridescent Hunt
data.passiveDescription: Upon hit, Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing {{40//50//60//70//80%}} of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every {{14//13//12//11//10}}s.
